Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: You feel skeevy and dirty when you do it. But you do it anyway and you change it back as soon as you can, because you don’t want to start getting the Republican mailings,
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: to vote in more competitive Republican primaries, then changing back for the general election

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: Most people don’t want to dive into those type of discussions.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: they respect individuals for what they do, how they work, regardless of political views

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: Last winter, dozens of locals gathered outside to honk and cheer as one Democrat left town.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: community support for a local Democrat, Ed Fullmer, as he left for a high school basketball team event

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: According to Associated Press election data, Niobrara County’s Democrats, who account for just 2.6% of registered voters, are the most outnumbered by Republicans in the 30 states that track local party affiliation.
Document Sources.Source Justification: used to track and compare party affiliations across states

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Nationwide, Democrats account for fewer than 3% of voters in three counties this year, up from one county in 2020 but down from seven in 2016, according to the AP data.
Document Sources.Source Justification: used to track changes in Democratic voter registration over time

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Normally I just roll my eyes and walk away because I’m fighting a losing battle and I’m fully aware of that.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: long-time Democrat in a predominantly Republican area, sharing personal experiences

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: You feel skeevy and dirty when you do it. But you do it anyway and you change it back as soon as you can, because you don’t want to start getting the Republican mailings,
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: sharing personal experience of switching party registration to vote in Republican primaries

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: I am who I am, and I have the views that I have. And I don’t care if it bothers people or not.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: expressing commitment to her political views despite being in a minority

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: How far are they going to go to limit one’s ability to vote? If it really comes down to purifying the party, on a voting level all the way up to the elected officials, pretty soon there isn’t going to be anyone left who’s pure enough to be in the party.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: critiquing the new law limiting party affiliation changes, drawing from his experience in the Legislature

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: The best way to participate in meaningful change is to try to sway the dominant party.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: sharing his reasoning for registering as a Republican despite holding left-leaning views

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Most people don’t want to dive into those type of discussions.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: sharing his experience of people avoiding political discussions in the community

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Party-switching had undermined the sanctity of Wyoming’s primary process.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: explaining the reasoning behind the new law limiting party affiliation changes

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The Wyoming Legislature, where the GOP controls over 90% of the seats, passed legislation last year banning voters from changing their party registration in the three months before the August primary.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: body responsible for passing the law limiting party affiliation changes

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: Wyoming’s Republican and Democratic primaries on Tuesday will be the first in modern memory where voters won’t be able to change party affiliation at the polls.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: context for the primaries being affected by the new law
